entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 24 April 2023
